content: shushrooshakkaaran :- baarekmor, nammute dyvamaaya kartthaavin്re sneham moolam parishuddhavum divyavumaaya chumbanatthaal ororutthanum avanavan്re atutthavanu thammil thammil samaadhaanam kotukkanam.
Janam :- dyvamaaya kartthaave! Njangalute aayushkaalam muzhuvanum ee samaadhaanatthinu njangale yogyaraakkaname.

1. Anyonyam shlommo nalkin,
kartthaavin shlommo nammil
/tvaasam cheytheetattennum,
/tthammil chumbikkenam naam
thalshlommoyum shynoyum namme kaakkattennaalum.

2. Maalikayil shishyanmaaro-
tuththaanatthin naalukalil
/tnaathan kalppicchaanevam
/tshlommo! Priyare! Ningalilee-
shlommo vaazhattennaalum lokaanthuyattholam thanne.

3. Anyonyam snehikkaname
nnothiya naathaa! Nin sneham
/tvaaneetanamengalilennum
/tsthuthi, dyvatthinnuyaratthil
bhoothalamengum nal shaanthi maanavaritayil sampreethi.
shushrooshakkaaran:- kotukkappettirikkunna parishuddhavum divyavumaaya ee samaadhaanatthinu shesham karunayulla kartthaavinte mumpaake naam thala kunikkanam.
Janam :- njangalute kartthaavum (njangalute) dyvavume nin്re thirumumpaake njangal thala kunikkunnu.

Shushrooshakkaaran :- baarekmor. Sahodarangale naam ellaavarum bhamgiyotum bhayatthotum vanakkatthotum, vetippotum vishuddhiyotum snehatthotum sathyavishvaasatthotum, nalla dyvabhakthiyotum koote ninnu (bahumaanappetta ee pattakkaaran്re) kykalaal nammute mumpaake vaykkappettirikkunna bhayankaravum parishuddhavumaaya ee kurbbaanayil sookshikkanam. Enthennaal naam ellaavarkkum vendi jeevanulla bali sakalatthinteyum utayavanaaya pithaavaam dyvatthinu nirappilum samaadhaanatthilum anaykkunnu.
Janam : (ee kurbbaana) anugrahangalum samaadhaanavum baliyum sthothravum aakunnu.
